#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
ll k;
int main()
{
	ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
	int tc;
	cin >> tc;
	vector<int>vec;
	vector<int>vec1;
	int a[6];
	a[0] = 8;
	for (int i = 1; i <= 5; i++)
		a[i] = 2 * (i - 1);
	while (tc--)
	{
		cin >> k;
		if (k <= 5)
			cout << a[k] << "\n";
		else {
			while (k > 0)
			{
				vec.push_back(k % 5);
				k = k / 5;
			}
			for (int i = vec.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--)
			{
				vec1.push_back(vec[i]);
			}
			int pos = vec.size() - 1;
			for (int i = vec1.size() - 1; i >= 1; i--)
			{
				if (vec1[i] == 0 && vec1[i - 1] == 0)
					continue;
				else if (vec1[i] == 0 && vec1[i - 1] != 0)
				{
					pos = i - 1;
					break;
				}
				else
					break;
			}
			if (pos == 0)
			{
				if (vec1[0] != 1)
					cout << a[vec1[0]];
				for (int i = 1; i < vec1.size(); i++)
					cout << "8";
				cout << "\n";
			}
			else
			{
				for (int i = 0; i < vec1.size(); i++)
				{
					if (i < pos)
					{
						if (vec1[i] != 0)
							cout << a[vec1[i] + 1];
						else
							cout << "0";
					}
					else
					{
						cout << a[vec1[i]];
					}
					
				}
				cout << "\n";
			}
			vec.clear();
			vec1.clear();
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
